description: Bring some international flair to the table with this Tuscan-inspired potato soup. Creamy and silky, the humble spud never tasted so fancy.
name: Tuscan-Inspired Potato Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in power greens and half of the parmesan until greens have wilted. Ladle soup into bowls and season with pepper. Serve topped with remaining parmesan.
